title: Randuin's is BS.
body: Gonna have to start buying Frozen Mallet on AD Carries again.

replies.body:
its only 20% crit reduction (with mastery) not that much if you think about it. say you crit for 500 (no infinity edge) normally on them, the 20% crit reduction only applies to the **bonus crit damage** so you would have 250 base damage, then the other 250 damage receives the 20% reduction resulting in an over all lower of 50, making you crit for 450, its not really that big of a deal, it lets them take maybe 1 more attack, which only really matters if you urgently need that person gone, which in most cases the tanks are last to be dealt with, so that reduction only does a little, and only really applies to people buying crit. Riot removes 100 hp and 10 armor to replace it with a small damage reduction that only applies to crit, this is actually an overall nerf to the item. the slow could far exceed what its capped at now, reaching up to around 6-10 sec slow on unis with very high armor and magic resist. It's slow was reduced, the overall hp and armor was reduced, all replaced with a 10 (20 for mastery)damage reduction on attacks critting for 200 damage (190 after reduction(no infinity edge)) as the 10% only applies to the bonus crit damage. People with infinity edge critting for 250 would still only have a pretty low reduction of 15 (30 for mastery)(50% more than no infinity) applied. Unless the tank also gets the crit reduction mastery this doesn't do that much for protection. The item was overall nerfed, it just stacks decently with the mastery. For crits of 1000, 100 (150 for ie) reduction isn't that trivial, but, maybe the reduction from both the mastery and item together might seem to be strong (300 for ie 200 without ie)

yes the 300 reduction isn't that trivial, but you still melt enemies at the same speed, and only tanks and bruisers would buy it, maybe an adc looking for an adc dueling alternative.

All in all, this change is only really effective if it has the mastery to accompany it. This item would be strong if it applied to the overall damage (giving 600 reductions overall for an ie crit of 1000, with mastery) but because it is only the bonus crt damage affected, it really isn't that scary, and shouldn't affect the time it takes to kill a tank by that much longer.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Randuin's_Omen :
"New Passive: 10% reduced damage from Critical strikes. This affects the total attack damage dealt by a critical strike, not an additive 10% reduction in their critical strike damage."

It doesn't reduce their crits to 190% Damage (-10% additive), if it was; a 100 AD Crit would be 200 reduced to 190 (Crit multiplier would be 1.9x that 100 = 190) - it's actually 200 reduced by 10% so is -10% of that 200 making it -20 Damage.

Plus the slow is 4 seconds now instead of 2 with scaling based on each 100 MR and armor being +1 second.
This is accurate, i ran a few tests with a friend, oh and also, the Passive can be stacked (so against an all Crit team you can take 70% less damage)
the omen is, but mastery isn't, so they can be stacked
